rules_text:
Whenever one or more counters are put an artifact or creature you control, you may create an X/X black Phyrexian creature token, where X is the number of counters put on that permanent this way. Do this only once each turn.
Grand evolution 2–{4} [i]({4}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
